main.title: MAIN
main.article: Hi, I'm Dzmitry, originally from Minsk, Belarus. I've been working as a developer for many years and I'm always eager to learn and explore new technologies. My journey into IT began back in school, when I started creating game servers. I'm fluent in English at a B2 level, which allows me to collaborate effectively with international teams and projects.

hobbies.title: HOBBIES
hobbies.article: I draw inspiration from video games, sports, and late-night walks. I also enjoy cooking and often spend nights coding - that's when the best ideas come to life.

summary.title: SUMMARY
summary.article:
I have built and maintained complex web platforms, e-commerce solutions, cross-platform mobile applications, and real-time systems.
My expertise spans across modern frameworks and technologies including Vue (Vue 2/3, Vuex, Pinia, Nuxt 2/3), React (Redux, Next.js), TypeScript, Node.js, PHP, Magento, Strapi, MySQL, Docker, WebSockets, and payment gateway integrations.

Key highlights of my work include:
  • Engineering real-time applications with WebSocket integrations, live data streaming, and secure workflows for sensitive document handling.
  • Creating custom web tools such as a web-based image editor (Canvas, SVG) for product personalization.
  • Designing and implementing admin dashboards and PWAs for fleet and booking management.
  • Developing large-scale e-commerce platforms (Magento, custom frontends) with multi-store setups, international payment integrations, and optimized SEO.
  • Building cross-platform mobile apps with Ionic, supporting offline mode, background sync, and real-time fleet tracking.
  • Delivering SEO-optimized corporate websites with CMS integrations forscalable content management.
  • Mentoring developers, conducting code reviews, teaching frontend technologies, and supporting CI/CD pipelines.
I work confidently across the entire project lifecycle — from architecture and development to deployment and performance optimization — while maintaining strong communication with stakeholders.
